text: Mrs. Soffel is a 1984 American romantic crime drama movie directed by Gillian Armstrong and starring Mel Gibson, Diane Keaton, Matthew Modine, Edward Herrmann, Trini Alvarado, Jennifer Dundas, Terry O'Quinn, Maury Chaykin, Heather Graham. It was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn-Mayer. ==Other websites== * Category:1984 crime movies Category:1980s crime drama movies Category:1984 romantic drama movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:MGM movies Category:Movies directed by Gillian Armstrong Category:Movies set in Pittsburgh
title: Mrs. Soffel
